page.description: Called when a batch of updates is about to be processed for a table. This event is useful for displaying a progress/cancel dialog.
page.prototype: TableBegin(Context as P, Action as C, TableName as C)

argument.name: Context
argument.description: The object on which the function is called (generally a [DatabaseSnapshot object])

argument.name: Action
argument.description: The action being performed. Will be one of the following values: *[Load]*, *[Store]*, *[LoadDBF]*, or *[StoreDBF]*.

argument.name: TableName
argument.description: The name of the table being updated.

page.example: FUNCTION TableBegin(Context as P, Action as C, TableName as C) Statusbar.Set_Text("Table " + Action + " beginning for table " + TableName) END FUNCTION
